headline: Marriott International President and Chief Executive Officer to Speak at Morgan Stanley Travel and Leisure Conference June 3; Remarks to be Webcast
summary: Marriott International, Inc.'s (Nasdaq: MAR) President and Chief Executive Officer Anthony Capuano will speak at the 2025 Morgan Stanley Travel and Leisure Conference, to be held on Tuesday, June 3. Mr. Capuano's remarks will be at approximately 8:45 a.m., Eastern Time, and will be webcast live.

headline: Marriott International (NasdaqGS:MAR) Expands Luxury Wedding Venues Across Scenic Mexico Locations
summary: Marriott International (NasdaqGS:MAR) recently highlighted its wedding venue offerings, featuring luxurious options across its properties in Mexico. This product-related announcement, alongside robust earnings growth and a substantial share buyback, provided positive momentum for the company's stock. Over the past month, Marriott's shares climbed 12%, aligning with a broader market uptrend. The ex-dividend date for a $0.67 per share cash dividend could also have supported the stock's...

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Toronto-Dominion Bank, Marriott International, Lennox International and Ralph Lauren
summary: Toronto-Dominion, Marriott, Lennox and Ralph Lauren declared dividends as investors seek stability amid tariffs, inflation and Fed rate cut uncertainty.
